param.name: useCustom
param.label: Use Custom JS
param.description: Controls whether or not to use custommizations below.

param.name: updateInterval
param.label: Update Interval
param.description: Determines how often to update javascript file parameters with user defined values. Default value is 8760 hours (365 days). 0 disables auto update and javascript is updated only once after saving current changes.

param.name: theme
param.label: Themes
param.description: Themes: grey (default), red, green, blue, gold

param.name: hideFlash
param.label: Hide Flash
param.description: Controls whether or not Flash objects should be hidden

param.name: outerBorder
param.label: Outer Border
param.description: Controls whether to show the outer grey (or theme) borders

param.name: resizeSpeed
param.label: Resize Speed
param.description: Controls the speed of the image resizing (1=slowest and 10=fastest)

param.name: maxOpacity
param.label: Max Opacity
param.description: Higher opacity = darker overlay, lower opacity = lighter overlay

param.name: navType
param.label: Navigation Type
param.description: ´Prev/Next´ buttons on top left and left (default), 2 = ´<< prev | next >>´ links next to image number

param.name: autoResize
param.label: Auto Resize
param.description: Controls whether or not images should be resized if larger than the browser window dimensions

param.name: doAnimations
param.label: Do Animations
param.description: Controls whether or not ´animate´ Lytebox, i.e. resize transition between images, fade in/out effects, etc.

param.name: borderSize
param.label: Border Size
param.description: If you adjust the padding in the CSS, you will need to update this publiciable -- otherwise, leave this alone...

param.name: slideInterval
param.label: Slide Interval
param.description: Change value (milliseconds) to increase/decrease the time between ´slides´ (10000 = 10 seconds)

param.name: showNavigation
param.label: Show Navigation
param.description: TRUE to display Next/Prev buttons/text during slideshow, FALSE to hide

param.name: showClose
param.label: Show Close
param.description: TRUE to display the Close button, FALSE to hide

param.name: showDetails
param.label: Show Details
param.description: TRUE to display image details (caption, count), FALSE to hide

param.name: showPlayPause
param.label: Show Play Pause
param.description: TRUE to display pause/play buttons next to close button, FALSE to hide

param.name: autoEnd
param.label: Auto End
param.description: TRUE to automatically close Lytebox after the last image is reached, FALSE to keep open

param.name: pauseOnNextClick
param.label: Pause On Next Click
param.description: TRUE to pause the slideshow when the ´Next´ button is clicked

param.name: pauseOnPrevClick
param.label: Pause On Prev Click
param.description: TRUE to pause the slideshow when the ´Prev´ button is clicked
